reviews.review_msg: She is a very outgoing, wonderful teacher. The midterm is very easy if you read your notes and attend class discussions. The tutorials are very interesting and easy marks. Canadian Studies 160 is overall an great course to study!

Unique professor, Class was not what I thought it would be. It seemed like an introductory social studies class. She runs the class like an elementary class. Also, the last province to join confederation was Newfoundland, not BC like she says.
